title: Pictures
description: This is a multiplatform minimal picture viewing application made with Electron. The current tested and working platforms are Windows and MacOs. I made this project to improve my JavaScript, Node.js & multiplatform skills. The general styling idea is to make it as minimal as possible, no borders and the top bar disappears.

title: Destructible terrain
description: A small game with a dynamic destructible terrain made in C++ with SFML and Box2D. This project was made to further enhance my knowledge of using libraries in C++

title: Astrozone
description: A local multiplayer one versus one game

title: Angry Birds
description: A small segment of Angry Birds remade in Unity with C#. Based of this segment I learned a lot about working with 2D sprites in this project, I also imrpvoed my C# and Unity knowledge.
